featured.text: (35) he offered to take me to his uncle’s seafood restaurant, just by the beach.

For example, Superman always arrives in the nick of time to prevent a disaster from happening, Peter Pan can fly at will to tease the bad guy Captain Hook, and Harry Potter has his magic power to take revenge on his uncle, aunt and cousin, who always ill-treat him. 44.

definition.zh_def: 叔叔；舅舅；姑丈，指父母的兄弟或配偶的兄弟。
definition.en_def: The brother of one's father or mother, or the husband of one's aunt.
definition.example: My uncle is coming to visit us this weekend.
